explains: n. 低音；浅色；小声；潜在的含意

sentences.en: "What d'you think?" she asked in an undertone.
His soft words contained an undertone of warning.
sentences.cn: 他温和的话中蕴涵着警告之意。

sentences.en: He added in an undertone to the Queen, "Really, my dear, YOU must cross-examine the next witness."
sentences.cn: 他又低声对王后说：“真的，亲爱的，下一个证人必须你来盘问了。”
